nodes.text: The Yavin's Caprice was a New Republic Gymsnor-3 light freighter.

Since it was unarmed,[source?] the Yavin's Caprice was required that it flew in remote areas with escorts. It was flanked with two Y-wing fighters when it was raided by Sol Mon's pirate forces in 11 ABY.

During the attack, the pirates destroyed at least one of the two Y-wing fighters serving as escorts. The Yavin's Caprice was then boarded by the crew of a Marauder Corvette and everyone on the cargo ship was either killed or captured.
